vendor_app.callbacks package¶

Submodules¶

vendor_app.callbacks.user_views module¶

class vendor_app.callbacks.user_views.ForgotPassword¶

Bases: DobatoApi

methods: t.ClassVar[t.Collection[str] | None] = {'POST'}¶

The methods this view is registered for. Uses the same default (["GET", "HEAD", "OPTIONS"]) as route and add_url_rule by default.

post()¶

API endpoint for forgot-password.

post()¶

Handle POST requests for password-forgot.

Usage:

Send a POST request to ‘/vendor-api/forgot-password’ with JSON payload containing ‘email’, ‘reset_url’ field.

Returns:

JSON response with success message.

class vendor_app.callbacks.user_views.RefreshTokenApi¶

Bases: DobatoApi

methods: t.ClassVar[t.Collection[str] | None] = {'POST'}¶

The methods this view is registered for. Uses the same default (["GET", "HEAD", "OPTIONS"]) as route and add_url_rule by default.

post()¶

API endpoint for user token refresh.

post()¶

Handle POST requests for user token refresh.

Usage:

Send a POST request to ‘/vendor-api/refresh-token’ with logged-in user

Returns:

JSON response with success message and new access and refresh token.

class vendor_app.callbacks.user_views.Register¶

Bases: DobatoApi

this view is for the vendor registration process

methods: t.ClassVar[t.Collection[str] | None] = {'POST'}¶

The methods this view is registered for. Uses the same default (["GET", "HEAD", "OPTIONS"]) as route and add_url_rule by default.

password_validation(password)¶
post()¶

API endpoint for user registration.

post()¶

Handle POST requests for user registration.

Usage:

Send a POST request to ‘/vendor-api/register’ with JSON payload containing ‘fullname’, ‘password’, ‘confirm_password’, ‘email’, and ‘phone_number’ fields.

Returns:

JSON response with registration status and message.

Returns:

JSON response with success message.

get()¶

API endpoint to get vendor basic info.

Endpoint: `GET /vendor-api/basic-info

get()¶

Handle get requests for one specific vendor basic info.

Usage:

Send a get request to ‘/vendor-api/basic-info’ with logged-in user.

Returns: JSON response with vendor basic info.

post()¶

API endpoint for vendor login. .. method:: post()

Handle POST requests for user login.

Usage:

Send a POST request to ‘/vendor-api/login’ with JSON payload containing ‘email’, ‘password’ fields.

Returns:

JSON response with access_token, refresh_token and success message.

class vendor_app.callbacks.user_views.VendorProfileApi¶

Bases: DobatoApi

API endpoint for managing vendor profiles.

This class provides GET and POST methods to retrieve and create vendor profiles.

methods: t.ClassVar[t.Collection[str] | None] = {'POST'}¶

The methods this view is registered for. Uses the same default (["GET", "HEAD", "OPTIONS"]) as route and add_url_rule by default.

post()¶

API endpoint for vendor profile creation.

post()¶

Handle POST requests for vendor profile creation.

Usage:

Send a POST request to ‘/vendor-api/profile’ with from-data containing ‘vendor_type’, ‘industry_id’, ‘profile_image’, ‘estd_date’, ‘location’,’pan_number’, ‘pan_image’, ‘pan_holder_citizenship’, ‘pan_holder_photo’ fields.

Returns:

JSON response with success status and message.

class vendor_app.callbacks.user_views.VendorProfileDetailApi¶

Bases: DobatoApi

Vendor profile detail api returns details for a specific vendor only

get()¶

API endpoint to get vendor profile detail.

Endpoint: `GET /vendor-api/profile-detail

get()¶

Handle get requests for one specific vendor profile.

Usage:

Send a get request to ‘/vendor-api/profile-detail’ with logged-in user.

Returns: JSON response with vendor profile data.

methods: t.ClassVar[t.Collection[str] | None] = {'GET', 'PUT'}¶

The methods this view is registered for. Uses the same default (["GET", "HEAD", "OPTIONS"]) as route and add_url_rule by default.

put()¶

API endpoint for vendor profile update.

put()¶

Handle PUT requests for vendor profile update.

Usage:

Send a PUT request to ‘/vendor-api/profile-detail’ with from-data containing ‘vendor_type’, ‘industry_id’, ‘profile_image’, ‘estd_date’, ‘location’, ‘pan_number’, ‘pan_image’, ‘pan_holder_citizenship’, ‘pan_holder_photo’ fields.

Returns:

JSON response with success status and message.

class vendor_app.callbacks.venue_views.FoodItemDetailApi¶

Bases: DobatoApi

delete(item_id)¶

API endpoint to delete a food-item.

delete()¶

Handle DELETE requests for a food-item.

Usage:

Send a delete request to ‘/vendor-api/food-items/<int:item_id>’ with logged-in user

Returns:

JSON response with success message.

get(item_id)¶

API endpoint to get food-item detail.

get()¶

Handle get requests for a food-item detail.

Usage:

Send a get request to ‘/vendor-api/food-items/<int:item_id>’ with logged-in user.

Returns:

JSON response with venue data.

methods: t.ClassVar[t.Collection[str] | None] = {'DELETE', 'GET', 'PUT'}¶

The methods this view is registered for. Uses the same default (["GET", "HEAD", "OPTIONS"]) as route and add_url_rule by default.

put(item_id)¶

API endpoint to update a food-item.

put()¶

Handle PUT requests for a food-item.

Usage:

Send a put request to ‘/vendor-api/food-items/<int:item_id>’ with logged-in user and food-item data containing ‘item_name’, ‘item_description’, ‘item_price’, ‘type’

Returns:

JSON response with success message.

post()¶

Usage:

Send a post request to ‘/vendor-api/menu/<int:menu_id>/menu-items’ with logged-in user and data like {‘menu_items’: [{‘item_id’:0, ‘menu_id’:menu_id}]}

Returns:

JSON response with success message.

Returns:

JSON response with success message.

API endpoint to get venue-space detail.

get()¶

Handle get requests for a venue-space detail.

Usage:

Send a get request to ‘/vendor-api/venue/<int:venue_id>/venue-space/<int:space_id>’ with logged-in user.

JSON response with venue data.

methods: t.ClassVar[t.Collection[str] | None] = {'DELETE', 'GET', 'PUT'}¶

The methods this view is registered for. Uses the same default (["GET", "HEAD", "OPTIONS"]) as route and add_url_rule by default.

put(venue_id, space_id)¶

API endpoint to update a venue-space.

put()¶

Handle PUT requests for a venue-space.

Usage:

Send a put request to ‘/vendor-api/venue/<int:venue_id>/venue-space/<int:space_id>’ with logged-in user and venue space data containing ‘space_name’, ‘space_type, ‘’description’, ‘rate’, ‘type_of_charge’, ‘seating_capacity’ and ‘floating_capacity’

Returns:

JSON response with success message.
